messages.title: My priorities for Mid Sussex
messages.content:
1. An exit from Brexit, investing the £50 billion Remain Bonus in public services.
2. Campaigning to revive town centres and support local businesses.
3. Give every child the best start in life by recruiting 20,000 more teachers.
4. Tackle the climate emergency and invest in renewables.

messages.title: Building a brighter future for Mid Sussex
messages.content: Robert Eggleston is fighting for Mid Sussex. He cares deeply about its people and its communities. He has a long track record as a local community campaigner.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Investing the £50 billion Remain Bonus in public services.
Campaigning to revive town centres by taking a lead on replacing unused sites by opening business units and taking measures to support Mid Sussex businesses.
Give every child the best start in life by recruiting 20,000 more teachers.

Tackling climate change by insulating all low-income homes by 2025, generating 80% of electricity from renewables by 2030, eliminating single-use plastics, investing in green industry, planting 60 million trees a year.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Only the Lib Dems can beat the Conservatives. Use your vote to help Lib Dem Robert Eggleston beat the Tories.

issues.brexitEurope: A vote for an exit from Brexit. Robert will fight for a people's vote on any final deal, with the option to remain.
issues.education: Give every child the best start in life by recruiting 20,000 more teachers.
issues.environment: Tackle the climate emergency and invest in renewables: Insulate all low-income homes by 2025, generate 80% of our electricity from renewables by 2030.
issues.immigration: Fighting for the rights of EU citizens to remain in the UK.
issues.labourEmployment: Helping small and medium size businesses, providing training and support for local services.

community.content: Campaigning to revive town centres and support local businesses. Robert Eggleston is taking a lead on replacing unused sites by opening business units and more investment. Support for local services including health, education, public transport.

leaflet.personalStatement: Councillor Robert Eggleston has lived in Mid Sussex for 30 years. He focuses on local issues and defending public services. Believes in an open, tolerant, compassionate and wealth creating society where all can reach their full potential.

politicalExperience.achievements: Active Campaigner on local issues and defending public services.

endorsements.endorsement: More and more Labour, Green and Tory voters are backing Robert Eggleston.

examples: The Lib Dems will recruit 20,000 more teachers at an extra £10 billion a year for schools.
Generate 80% of our electricity from renewables by 2030.
Only the Lib Dems can beat the Conservatives. Use your vote to help Lib Dem Robert Eggleston beat the Tories.
Robert Eggleston has lived in Mid Sussex for 30 years. He cares deeply about its people and its communities.
Believes in an open, tolerant, compassionate and wealth creating society where all can reach their full potential.
Campaigning to revive town centres and support local businesses.
Help small and medium size businesses.
Support for local services including health, education, public transport.
Tackle the climate emergency and invest in renewables.
A vote for an exit from Brexit.
Helping small and medium size businesses.

personalStories.story: Robert Eggleston has lived in Mid Sussex for 30 years and focuses on local issues. He cares deeply about its people and its communities.

examples: More and more Labour, Green and Tory voters are backing Robert Eggleston.
A damaging 'no deal' Brexit. Voted to leave the European Union without a deal.
More cuts to local services. Voted for severe school cuts across the nation.
